original_text: And so it is written, The first man Adam was made a living soul; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit.
korean_text: 기록된 바 첫 사람 아담은 생령이 되었다 함과 같이 마지막 아담은 살려 주는 영이 되었나니

sentences.original_text: The first man Adam was made a living soul
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 사람 아담은 살아있는 영이 되었고

sentences.original_text: the last Adam was made a quickening spirit
